attributes.review:
I logged into the app and some how developed very orange, thin, floppy, ugly hair just like this here president’s. That was my first symptom. Next i experienced extreme sweat glands overproducing and fake tanners getting thrown at my door. I believe this was a sign to delete the app so I did, but i wanted to share my experiences with the rest of you, I do not recommend getting this application or even voting for the cheeto again, I am very unhappy with the consequences of getting this app and having people in the world so dumb that they would vote for an actual bafoon.
xoxo 🤙🧚‍♂️💕❤️
attributes.title: cheeto hair

attributes.review: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS APP. I first opened it after it took me years to download then it had the audacity to ask me for my phone number and try to steal all of my information. 😡 Not to even mention what I saw when I opened the app. An orange man that burned my eyes as I looked at my screen. 📺 I am very disappointed 😞 as I was trying to be a good citizen and download the app because the president claims to want to make America great again. As I was saying this app is not worth it and a big waste of your precious time ⏰. I recommend you to do anything but download this app. I wish I could give it a zero not even a one star ⭐️ review. It truly does not deserve 1 Star. 💅  please improve this app, well what I really truly mean is to DELETE it right now!!! So no one has to suffer and open this app ever again. Thank you! 🙏🏽 😊
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible.

attributes.review: This app hacked my phone after using it once, I can’t believe the waste of time I put in trying to reset everything. It’s such a scam. Do not download.
attributes.title: Doesn’t even deserve one star

App took forever to download.  While I was watching that dang circle fill up, my cat “First Lady” got trapped in her cat door and ended up strangling herself to death.  By the time I got her to the vet and she was pronounced dead, the app still hadn’t finished loading. I love America and I love Trump, but this was to much.  Gonna delete the app and go buy a new cat.  Will not be downloading again ...
attributes.title: Worst experience ever
